Articles.Content: Was trying to add a customized flag to the game by using the YouTube tutorials can you still add the flags to the game or is unity V that picky. Just need help to add new flag to my game. I can see it in the file folder flags gut I can't select it as a mission flag any ideas.
Have you closed the game and restarted it?

17 hours ago, bewing said:

Have you closed the game and restarted it?

Yes many many times I just doesn't seem to be working. But I guess I could fry again after letting my computer sit for a couple days. Could be that I transferred the file from one computer to mine because I don't have photoshop on my game computer.

Edited May 20, 2016 by Buzz light fear
Lack of info

I figured it out I was choosing the downloads rather than where the info is saved to the game. Thanks fo the input anyhow the forums are the best. It actually is fun to hack game information and add new information.
